thread.title: The United States Desperately Needs A National Energy Policy
thread.title_full: The United States Desperately Needs A National Energy Policy

title: The United States Desperately Needs A National Energy Policy
text:
28 The United States Desperately Needs A National Energy Policy 
Clean Technica: There are two fundamental ‘things’ needed to sustain human life, water and energy. Water is the more precious of the two as reflected in the Arab saying “Water is life.” Without water life as we know it would not exist, and there are no substitutes for water – without it we die.
